"White-Knuckle White Summit Probe":
"How have you been, <%me>?
Oh no, it's not a request I have for you today, it's
another test of your ability as an ARKS op. But this
one's probably way too hard for you. I mean, you'll
have Snowbansers coming after you once you're
further in. Still, you're not a newbie anymore, so
maybe, just maybe, you could do this one.

*Complete the mission within 20 minutes
and earn a S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."

"<%me>、元気？
あ、いや、今回の依頼……じゃなくて
今回の力試しは流石にちょっと度が過ぎる
というか、難易度高いというかー……
いっちゃん奥ではスノウバンサーが
襲いかかってくるわけだし、無理だと思う。
でも、へっぽこぴーじゃなくなった
アンタならもしかして……とか思うのよね！

※ハード以上、２０分以内にＳランククリア"
